casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Michael E. VERRETT. No. 633P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Michael E. Verrett, Pro Se. Isaac T. Avery, III, Special Deputy Attorney General, Michael K. Lands, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 2nd day of November 2005 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of January 2006."
